data.name: Habitica Dark
data.description: A dark theme for Habitica. Recommended: Install this theme from here for automatic updates

data.name: Nitro Type: Shaky Shaky
data.description: Are you tired of a nice, calm typing experience? Do you want everything to be so hectic that you can barely tell what's going on? Introducing the Shaky Shaky theme for Nitro Type! Now, everything on any page on the site will be shaking wildly, no matter what! Have fun :)

data.name: Google Home Dark
data.description: Dark mode with none bugs for Google Home Page.

data.name: dmzj.com 动漫之家 简白
data.description:
屏蔽了广告(所以为了让动漫之家可以继续运营,关闭广告屏蔽插件),各种千年不变的部分
使页面简化许多.
观看体验主要为竖屏观看优化(横屏也没什么差别).
看漫画一定要先开启 翻页模式 的 上下滚动阅读 才行.
为了使漫画本身更突出,看漫画界面其他东西几乎所有内容都隐藏了.
